* An InvalidArgumentException is thrown if the arguments provided for a command are invalid.
* Constructs an InvalidArgumentException with the specified message.
* @param message The message, which may be retrieved with .getMessage().

* Deadline is a Task with a due date/time.

* Additionally, the due date/time is included.
* Event is a Task with a start and end date/time.
* Creates an Event with the specified description, start date/time, and end date/time.
* @param start Start date/time of the Event.
* @param end End date/time of the Event.
public Event(String description, String start, String end) {
* Additionally, the start and end date/time is included.
return String.format("%s (from: %s, to: %s)", super.toString(), start, end);
* Task is an entry in the task list.

* This is "X" if the task has been completed,
* or a space " " if the task has not been completed.
return (isDone ? "X" : " "); // mark done carbon.task with X
